page.title: 01MORWELLHAM AND AREA
page.content:
This area includes part of the Tamar and Tavy Valley and the ridge between. The principal features are as follows.
{Morwellham}is now an open air historical exhibition centre.People come from a long way to visit it,and enjoy the entertainment they have.It used to be a port for the copper mines in the 19th century. {Farming.}There are dairy and beef farms in this area.They also grow wheat and barley . {Forestry.}The forests in our area are deciduous and coniferous.They are used for timber. {Moorland.}There is some moorland in this area.There are lots of ponies and sheep on the moors and they are rounded up when the owners come to get them.
